Actions.Text: AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO LOCAL GOVERNMENT

Title: Relates to subjecting the Caumsett State Historic Park Preserve and Planting Fields Arboretum State Historic Park to taxation for all purposes
Summary: Relates to subjecting the Caumsett State Historic Park Preserve in the county of Suffolk, and Planting Fields Arboretum State Historic Park in the county of Nassau to taxation for all purposes.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property tax law, in relation to subjecting the Caumsett State Historic Park Preserve and Planting Fields Arboretum State Historic Park to taxation for all purposes
